entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Calgary (Olympic Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of freezing rain before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain early in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
